channel.title: /Home Command
channel.description: It has come to my understanding that you cannot venture far into the wilderness of moparcraft without dying before you get back. How about enabling the /home command for standard players? Or mabey even add a teleport to x & y positions?

item.title: /Home Command
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:22, topic:393820”][quote author=|SITTION| link=topic=491007.msg3595363#msg3595363 date=1305020323]

Thing is, ops want this to be as vanilla like as possible. Hell mitb doesn’t even want to have LWC.

thats, why this server is a huge badass fail, And thats why i bought minecraft and playing some other k()()l servers
[/quote]
Actually, we are really managing well without all the mods we had. All the guys who play servers for the mods are (for the most part) new guys, and I really liked mods too when I first started playing, then I found out how fun the game is without having any mods on.[/quote]
That is pretty much the exact reason we don’t have mods. I’m the same way, all the mods were awesome when I first started playing, but then I realized how much more fun it is without any mods.

Read full topic

item.title: /Home Command
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote="|SITTION|, post:18, topic:393820"][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=491007.msg3590993#msg3590993 date=1304634807]
Thing is, ops want this to be as vanilla like as possible. Hell mitb doesn’t even want to have LWC.
[/quote]

thats, why this server is a huge badass fail, And thats why i bought minecraft and playing some other k()()l servers[/quote]
Actually, we are really managing well without all the mods we had. All the guys who play servers for the mods are (for the most part) new guys, and I really liked mods too when I first started playing, then I found out how fun the game is without having any mods on.

Read full topic

item.title: /Home Command
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

about the pvp. it was for raids and to stop griefers. i like to free build, and dont like pvp at all. i voted no to /home but it does come in use if u have a load of diamonds or w/e and are stuck in a mine and have no clue how to get out. im usually never on when there is griefing going on, and if i were on i wouldnt be anywhere to stop it or w/e. atm pvp is kind of useless imo. if the server was bigger ok pvp maybe cool but ya i dont use pvp at all, and if i did i would get my butt handed to me b/c i dont have any armor, but i do have 2 diamonds swords that i was given.

edit: i may like pvp later but right now pvp isnt great. and i really only know one person u actually loves using it. u can do a google search about minecraft pvp being stupid. imo if u want pvp play a game where pvp is good, how rs pking compares to pvp in other games idk but rs pking is much better than mc pvp; i dont like pvp in any other game either unless there are no stakes.

to me the purpose of minecraft is to have fun and let ur imagination run free, and pvp kind of stops that. i mean u can compare real life to games and say hey if someone kills u and takes ur stuff. oh well it can happen irl. ya it can but u dont come back to life if u die irl. there has to be some line between comparing games, real life, and other games with different genres.

Read full topic

item.title: /Home Command
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Don’t you render a nether portal inoperable if you just pour lava on top of it? Then remove it whenever you want to enter it again? It seems that would stop people from coming through.

I do that with mine. It keeps the portal on, but anyone who goes through catches on fire.

Read full topic
